original_text: Behold, I waited for your words; I gave ear to your reasons, whilst ye searched out what to say.
korean_text: 보라 나는 당신들의 말을 기다렸노라 당신들의 슬기와 당신들의 말에 귀 기울이고 있었노라

sentences.original_text: Behold, I waited for your words
I gave ear to your reasons
whilst ye searched out what to say
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 무슨 말을 할지 찾아내는 동안에
